title: Teaching judo. Part 1. Introductory techniques
brief_description: Shows how a group of schoolboys using ordinary gymnasium equipment can be introduced to judo. Object is to produce full active participation, early experience of the throwing movement, and full movement range for each individual. A logical progression through various developing stages.
